Welcome to ProAuth!


Our app is designed to empower consumers and businesses by providing a seamless and reliable solution for verifying the authenticity of products.


With our app, you can easily scan QR codes found on product labels or packaging using your mobile device-s camera.
 Upon scanning, our advanced authentication technology instantly verifies the product-s authenticity, giving you peace of mind and confidence in your purchase.


Our mission is to combat counterfeit products and protect consumers from fraudulent goods.
 By leveraging cutting-edge technology and industry expertise, we aim to create a safer marketplace where authenticity and trust are paramount.

1. Introduction:

 Welcome to the Product Authenticity Verification App! This user manual is designed to guide you through the app's features and functionalities to help you verify the authenticity of products seamlessly.


2. Getting Started:


Account Creation: Create an account using your email address and complete other requested information to access the app's features.


3. Authenticity Verification Process:


Scan QR Code: Use the app to scan the QR code on the product label or packaging.
 Verify Authenticity: Receive instant feedback on the product's authenticity status based on the scanned QR code.


4. QR Code Scanning:


Camera Scan: Point your device's camera at the QR code to scan it directly from the product.
 Gallery Scan: Upload an image of the QR code from your device's gallery to initiate the scanning process.


5. Changing Password:


Navigate to the "Login Page".
 Select the "Change Password" option.
 Follow the prompts to enter your current password and set a new one.
